# LIQUE Miami — News & Stories

> AI-powered news and stories hub for LIQUE Miami, a premium waterfront restaurant and nightlife lounge in North Miami Beach, Florida.

This site publishes articles about Miami nightlife, dining trends, events, and stories connected to the LIQUE Miami brand. Content is generated and curated using AI automation.

---

## About LIQUE Miami

LIQUE Miami is a premium waterfront restaurant and nightlife lounge located at 3957 NE 163rd St, North Miami Beach, FL 33160.

The venue blends Mediterranean cuisine with live DJ entertainment and panoramic bay views, transitioning seamlessly from fine dining to late-night lounge throughout the evening.

- Phone: +1 (305) 705-2425
- Email: info@liquemiami.com
- Website: https://liquemiami.com

---

## Hours of Operation

- Monday–Thursday: 6 PM – 1 AM
- Friday–Saturday: 4 PM – 2 AM
- Sunday (Brunch + Evening): 12 PM – 12 AM

---

## Dining & Experience

- Mediterranean cuisine: seafood, signature plates, artistic presentation
- Sunday Brunch (12 PM – 4 PM)
- Happy Hour with craft cocktails and appetizers
- Full craft cocktail bar, premium spirits, champagne, curated wine list
- Live DJs on Friday & Saturday (house and lounge music)
- Waterfront terrace with panoramic Miami bay views

---

## Venue Spaces

- **Outdoor Terrace** — Open-air waterfront lounge, up to 100 guests
- **The Living Room** — Intimate indoor lounge with plush seating, up to 60 guests
- **Exclusive Dining** — Private banquet-style space for milestone celebrations

---

## Private Events & Catering

LIQUE Miami hosts private events for up to 160 guests.

Services include:
- Custom Mediterranean menus and curated cocktail packages
- Premium bar packages and full-service catering
- Live entertainment and A/V capabilities
- Dedicated event coordinator

Book a private event: https://lique.tripleseat.com/party_request/42471

---

## Reservations

Reserve a table: https://lique-miami-present-production.up.railway.app/#contact

---

## This News Site

- URL: https://ainewstest.vercel.app
- Content: News, events, and stories about Miami dining, nightlife, and LIQUE Miami
- Technology: Next.js 15, Supabase, AI-generated content via Google Gemini
- Built and maintained by Sharcon (https://sharconai.com)
